## ThirdwebSDK.getCustomContract() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get an instance of a Custom ThirdwebContract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCustomContract(address: string): Promise<CustomContract<import("contracts").ThirdwebContract>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CustomContract](./sdk.customcontract.md)<!-- -->&lt;import("contracts").ThirdwebContract&gt;&gt;

the contract
